p: Intraperitoneal administration of isoquercetin to 4-week-old female BALB/c mice infected with human influenza A virus showed a significant decrease in virus titers and pathological changes in the lung. The lungs were subjected to RNA extraction and qRT-PCR to detect IFN-Î³ RANTES and iNOS levels as indicators of lung inflammation and virus titers. In addition, they were evaluated for histopathology [ 95].
